00021 #define TTE_TARGET_H_
00022 
00023 #define TARGET_NXHX500
00024 
00025 #if defined (TARGET_ATOM_LINUX)
00026    #include <linux/ktime.h>
00027 
00028    #define  TTE_HZ                  (1000000000)
00029    #define  TTE_MIN_TIMER           (100000)
00030    #define  SLOT_PROC_DELAY         (5000)
00031    #define  TTE_CLOCKSYNC_WINDOW    (100000)
00032    #define  TTE_CS_ALG_DELAY        (600)     /*60 us*/
00033    #define  TTE_RX_CS_MSG_DELAY     (45)
00034    #define  TARGET_MAX_TT_TX_BUFS   (256)
00035    #define  TARGET_MAX_TT_RX_BUFS   (256)
00036    #define  TTE_TIMER_TYPE          union ktime
00037 
00038 #elif defined (TARGET_NXHX500)
00039    #include "sysdefine.h"
00040 
00041    #define  TTE_HZ                  (1000000000)
00042    #define  TTE_MIN_TIMER           (100000)

00046    #define  TTE_RX_CS_MSG_DELAY     (45)
00047    #define  TARGET_MAX_TT_TX_BUFS   (256)
00048    #define  TARGET_MAX_TT_RX_BUFS   (256)
00049    #define  TTE_TIMER_TYPE          uint32_t
00050    typedef  signed   int            dma_addr_t;
00051 
00052    // meine eigenen kleinen defines TODO
